channel.title: Emote when you die
channel.description: In my pk server, when you die, their is no emote of you falling to the ground ? can someone give me the code, of a decent one, and tell me how i fix it , and where i fix it ? thanks guys. :)

item.title: Emote when you die
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

if no one posts you an emote… download a source, and im sure they will have one. itll take more work but youll learn it yourself.

but if i remembered how id tell you. btw is your server online, i need someone to team view me…

Read full topic
